unitTests.mainframe

Class StationsControllerStubFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • unitTests.mainframe.StationsControllerStubFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStationsControllerFactory

    public class StationsControllerStubFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStationsControllerFactory
    this stub factory returns the same object - and we can make it return a brand new object by invoking restart()

    Emil
